resources.string: Talented software developer with 4 years of experience and a strong education in all aspects of full stack application development. History of implementing, deploying, testing, and supporting successful applications and embedded systems with high accuracy, maintainability, and performance in the financial and healthcare domain.

Talented software developer with extensive hands-on experience and strong educational background in all aspects of full-stack application development. History of implementing, deploying, testing, and supporting successful financial applications and embedded systems with high accuracy, maintainability, and performance. As technologies are changing on a daily basis, I\'m always motivated to learn and adapt to new skills.

Languages: Java
 Web: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, WordPress, AJAX, jQuery, Bootstrap
 Web Services: REST
 Web/App Servers: XAMPP, Tomcat
 Frameworks: NodeJS, ExpressJS, Spring Boot, ReactJS, AngularJS, Angular, Hibernate
 Databases: MySQL, MS SQL, MongoDB, Oracle
 Design Patterns: Singleton, Factory, Template
 SDLC: Agile-Scrum, Extreme Programming(XP)
 Tools: NetBeans, Eclipse, IntelliJ, VS Code, Visual Studio, Trello, MS Visio, Sublime Text, Maven, Git, JUnit, Selenium
 Platforms: Windows, Linux

MEAN Travelers Guide, MIU (2021): Individually designed and developed a MEAN application which provides detailed tourism guides for many countries. Technologies Used: NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, AngularJS, Bootstrap, CSS, HTML, Visual Studio Code, Postman, Git\n Web Store, MIU (2021): Developed an online e-commerce system where employees may manage product listings and customers have a smooth shopping experience. Technologies Used: Spring Boot, JUnit, MongoDB, React, Bootstrap, CSS, Visual Studio Code, IntelliJ, Postman, Selenium, Git

Met all project specifications and requirements for project development.
 • Designed and developed server-side of recommendation service using Spring Boot 
 • Responsible for developing the code, involved in Agile Extreme programming practices like Scrum, Pair Programming, TDD, Continuous Integration.
 • Involved in design and development of UI component, using frameworks Angular, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3.
 • Tested, troubleshot, and deployed finalized applications.
 • Provided support for errors and technical issues.

Developed new applications and modified existing systems for POS machines.
 • Met all project specifications and requirements for project development.
 • Designed aesthetic user interfaces and implemented functional algorithms.
 • Tested, troubleshot, and deployed finalized applications.
 • Customized existing applications to meet new business needs.
 • Provided support for errors and technical issues in both hardware and software.
 • Trained client employees and end-users on new versions and features.
